page.lettertext:
fol.188r
[15]
92 pr
o
May To M
r
Bodly
Right worshipfull: we have receved twoe
Letters from yo
w
. the one of the 25
th
, the other
of the 26
th
of the last month: by which
we are fully advertised of that, which before
we had but report of in parte: and therefore
to have the certainty of the
states
resolutione
sent thether our poste with letters unto yo
w
:
we have appointed comittyes, who are to be there
one the 8
th
day of this month, which yt may
please yo
w
to signify unto the states, that our
men be not forced to attend there longer then
needes:
and thus being still bolde to importune
yow with our troublsome matters, we take our
leave of yo
w
with our very harty c
o
mendations:
from Middelburch the first of may a
o
1592:
Yo
r
worshippes loving freendes at comaundment the Deputy and generality of the Merchants adventurers Thomas Ferrers deputy
